title: Design for Printed Textile-Shower, Series #500-509
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Cut paper, red pencil on white tracing paper
description: Small, tapered triangles of  brown, light brown, blue and olive cut papers fastened to white paper in random pattern, vertically descending to sugest rain. Ruled red lines down left and right sides and dashes across lower margin of sheet.
name: collage
